javafx.scene.shape

Enum FillRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<FillRule>
      • javafx.scene.shape.FillRule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<FillRule>

    public enum FillRule
extends java.lang.Enum<FillRule>
    The fill rule for determining the interior of the path.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      EVEN_ODD
      Defines an even-odd filling rule for determining the interior of a path.
      NON_ZERO
      Defines a non-zero filling rule for determining the interior of a path.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • EVEN_ODD

        public static final FillRule EVEN_ODD
        Defines an even-odd filling rule for determining the interior of a path. The even-odd rule specifies that a point lies inside the path if a ray drawn in any direction from that point to infinity is crossed by path segments an odd number of times.

      • NON_ZERO

        public static final FillRule NON_ZERO
        Defines a non-zero filling rule for determining the interior of a path. The non-zero rule specifies that a point lies inside the path if a ray drawn in any direction from that point to infinity is crossed by path segments a different number of times in the counter-clockwise direction than the clockwise direction.

    System.out.println(c);
